description: This week we've got a special treat for all you die-hard Hoss fans who have been begging me to release some of his 'lost' footage. Well guess what? I was going through the war chest and discovered one of his very first video appearances where he starts out in some sexy ass tighty-whities asleep and wakes up with a raging hard-on. Our tough Texan puts on one hell of a show for the camera, ending things out with a huge, hot load all over the camera lens (you can imagine it's right on your face) as I shot from down below his cock and between his legs. This is a classic for sure and it's only available to members -- never released on DVD.
title: Hoss
